channel.title: CVE Feed for Jose Mortellaro -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jose Mortellaro -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-22687|2024-08-02T10:13:50.030Z -- jose%20mortellaro -- freesoul%20deactivate%20plugins%20%E2%80%93%20plugin%20manager%20and%20cleanup
item.description: Insecure Storage of Sensitive Information vulnerability in Jose Mortellaro Freesoul Deactivate Plugins – Plugin manager and cleanup plugin <= 1.9.4.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29126|2024-06-04T17:57:31.847Z -- jose%20mortellaro -- specific%20content%20for%20mobile%20%E2%80%93%20customize%20the%20mobile%20version%20without%20redirections
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Jose Mortellaro Specific Content For Mobile – Customize the mobile version without redirections allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Specific Content For Mobile – Customize the mobile version without redirections: from n/a through 0.1.9.5.
